Tom starts to panic. How could this be? It makes no sense! he thought. He starts to call the police to report this, but they say that they can't help him. He talks to his friend Rob and together they decide it's up them to solve the mystery of the changing mugs.

An alien species was playing jokes on us by changing all the #1 Dad mugs in the world! Apparently, this was their idea of fun. But the Dads of the world didn't think so!
